item.description:
Nubar is a new restaurant at the Sheraton Commander Hotel. It has a large space for mingling in front of a fireplace and is quite lovely.

Directions:

The Sheraton Commander is located on Garden Street very near the Cambridge Common (metered parking surrounds the common and is checked until 8pm). It is a short walk from the Harvard Square T station by walking two short blocks north on Mass Ave and then making a left on Garden and walking a couple of longer blocks.

There is a parking lot at the hotel and parking will be $10 with a stamp on your ticket from the staff.

An alternative is to park at University Place Garage at 124 Mount Auburn Street with a coupon through http://boston.centralparking.com/Cambridge-124-Mount-Auburn-Street-Parking- parking-coupon.html. The coupon allows for parking for $7.00 after 4pm.  If you park at University Place Garage, it will be faster to walk through Radcliffe yard (enter Radcliffe on Brattle and walk through yard to Garden.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be gathering at NUBAR
item.name: Exploring the new NUBAR at the Sheraton Commander in Cambridge
